#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
#define p(x) cout<<x<<":"<<x<<"\n"
int cs,i;
string str;

bool le(string x,string y)
{
  if(x.size()<y.size())
    return 1;
  if(x.size()>y.size())
    return 0;
  return x<=y;
}
int main()
{
  scanf("%d",&cs);
  while(cs--)
  {
    cin>>str;
    for(i=1;le(A[i],str);i++);
    printf("%s\n",B[i-1].c_str());
  }
	return 0;
}
